tool_description: Makes the final location selection based on comprehensive evaluation scores, practical constraints, and client preferences to confirm the session venue.

evaluation_scores.description: Corresponding evaluation scores for each location

final_session_date.description: Confirmed session date in YYYY-MM-DD format

client_priority.description: Client's top priority: cost, convenience, aesthetics, or uniqueness

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: evaluated_locations and evaluation_scores must have the same length
Empty location list: Must provide at least one evaluated location
Invalid date format: Session date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Invalid client priority: Must be one of [cost, convenience, aesthetics, uniqueness]
Invalid scores: All evaluation scores must be between 0 and 100
usage: Provide evaluated locations with their scores, final session date, and client priority. The tool returns the optimal location selection with detailed justification.

selected_location.description: Final selected location for the portrait session

selection_score.description: Final score of the selected location

selection_rationale.description: Detailed explanation of why this location was selected
